irrational_audit.note: Each blob: base64-decode → sha256(raw) must equal 'sha256'.

help: Load capsule JSON, recompute merkle_root from listed leaves, compare.

proof_of_work.hash_of: sha256( canonical({'capsule':<this capsule without proof_of_work>, 'pow_nonce': nonce}) )

embedded_blobs.rule: for each blob: base64-decode(data) then sha256(raw)==sha256 and bytes==len(raw)
